title: SKIN IDEA - Anniversary Skins for Champions
body: Had a thought that crossed my mind, what if Riot brought back old champion models/animations as Anniversary skins? In a way to pay homage to LoL's low-poly roots, imagine being able to play as pre-rework Garen, TF, Annie, and the list goes on. Considering some heavy work would need to be done, these could be 1350 Anniversary skins. I think it'd be really fun, and a nice way for people to get a good nostalgia fix at the same time!
